input.label: Site:
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup lookup_host_site.csv | stats count by SiteName

html.p: This dashboard displays the various host performance details. By default, only the top 10 hosts are shown for each category. To change the number of hosts displayed, modify the sort command on the underlying searches. Click on a row to get further details about the displayed metrics.

table.title: CPU Metrics - % Processor Time
table.searchString: `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMk:Processor" instance="_Total" SiteName="$SiteName$" host="$machinename$" | stats avg(%_Processor_Time) AS avg max(%_Processor_Time) AS max sparkline(avg(%_Processor_Time)) AS Trend latest(%_Processor_Time) as Current latest(_time) as "Last Updated" by host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort 10 - avg | eval avg = round(avg, 2) | eval max = round(max, 2) | eval Current = round(Current, 2) | table host avg max Current Trend "Last Updated" | rename host AS Machine avg AS "Average" max AS "Max Value"

table.title: System Metrics - Processor Queue Length
table.searchString: `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMk:System" SiteName="$SiteName$" host="$machinename$" | lookup winHosts host OUTPUT NumberOfCores | fillnull value="1" NumberOfCores | eval Processor_Queue_Length = Processor_Queue_Length / NumberOfCores | stats avg(Processor_Queue_Length) AS avg max(Processor_Queue_Length) AS max sparkline(avg(Processor_Queue_Length)) AS Trend latest(Processor_Queue_Length) AS Current latest(_time) AS "Last Updated" values(NumberOfCores) AS NumberOfCores by host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort 10 - avg | eval avg = round(avg, 2) | eval max = round(max, 2) | eval Current = round(Current, 2) | table host avg max Current Trend NumberOfCores "Last Updated" | rename host AS Machine NumberOfCores AS "# Cores" avg AS "Average/Core" max AS "Max/Core"

table.title: Memory Metrics
table.searchString: `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMk:Memory" SiteName="$SiteName$" host="$machinename$" | eval Available_Bytes = Available_Bytes / 1024 | stats avg($memMetric$) AS avg max($memMetric$) AS max sparkline(avg($memMetric$)) AS Trend latest($memMetric$) as Current latest(_time) as "Last Updated" by host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort 10 - avg | eval avg = round(avg, 2) | eval max = round(max, 2) | eval Current = round(Current, 2) | table host avg max Current Trend "Last Updated" | rename host AS Machine avg AS "Average" max AS "Max"

table.title: Disk Metrics
table.searchString: `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMk:LogicalDisk" instance="_Total" SiteName="$SiteName$" host="$machinename$" | stats avg($diskMetric$) AS avg max($diskMetric$) AS max sparkline(avg($diskMetric$)) AS Trend latest($diskMetric$) as Current latest(_time) as "Last Updated" by host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort 10 - avg | eval avg = round(avg, 2) | eval max = round(max, 2) | eval Current = round(Current, 2) | table host avg max Current Trend "Last Updated" | rename host AS Machine avg AS "Average" max AS "Max"

table.title: Page File Metrics - % Usage
table.searchString: `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMk:PageFile" SiteName="$SiteName$" host="$machinename$" | stats avg(%_Usage) AS avg max(%_Usage) AS max sparkline(avg(%_Usage)) AS "Trend" latest(%_Usage) as Current latest(_time) as "Last Updated" by host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort 10 - avg | eval avg = round(avg, 2) | eval max = round(max, 2) | eval Current = round(Current, 2) | table host avg max Current Trend "Last Updated" | rename host AS Machine avg AS "Average" max AS "Max"

table.title: Network Metrics - Bytes Total/Sec
table.searchString: `xd_perfmon_index` sourcetype="PerfmonMk:NetworkInterface" SiteName="$SiteName$" host="$machinename$" | stats avg(Bytes_Total/sec) AS avg max(Bytes_Total/sec) AS max sparkline(avg(Bytes_Total/sec)) AS Trend latest(Bytes_Total/sec) as Current latest(_time) as "Last Updated" by host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort 10 - avg | eval avg = round(avg, 2) | eval max = round(max, 2) | eval Current = round(Current, 2) | table host avg max Current Trend "Last Updated" | rename host AS Machine avg AS "Average" max AS "Max"
